trans-unit.source: Represents the type information for an authentication module.

This class corresponds to the `type` attribute of the [\<add\> Element for authenticationModules (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/add-element-for-authenticationmodules-network-settings.md) configuration element.
This class is used to specify modules registered to authenticate requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes.
This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.AuthenticationModuleElement"></xref> class.
This constructor sets the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.AuthenticationModuleElement.Type%2A> property to `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.AuthenticationModuleElement"></xref> class with the specified type information.
The `typeName` parameter contains the fully qualified type name followed by a comma (,) and the assembly information.
The elements of the assembly information are separated with commas, for example, `Corp.Net.Authenticator, Corp, Version=1.0.5000.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken="00000000000000000"`.
A string that identifies the type and the assembly that contains it.
Gets or sets the type and assembly information for the current instance.
This property contains the fully qualified type name followed by a comma (,) and the assembly information.
The elements of the assembly information are separated with commas, for example, `Corp.Net.Authenticator, Corp, Version=1.0.5000.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken="00000000000000000"`.
A string that identifies a type that implements an authentication module or `null` if no value has been specified.
